page.title: 05Farming
page.content: My Dad and Grandad grow wheat, oats and barley. They have got 98 beast and 143 sheep. The farm covers 240 acres. They feed the beast with ground oats, and barley,hay and straw. They go to Melton cattle market on Tuesdays and sometimes on Fridays, as well as Leicester cattle market. The hay bales we use are small.They buy all of the beast and sheep at Melton market and sell their lambs there..{by Chris My Grandad grows rape,wheat and barley.One year he grew turnips.He has 140 Beast,18 Hens,3 Cats,2 Dogs,a Cow and calf.On Tuesday he always takes 6 beast to Melton market.Sometimes on Saturday he goes to Northampton cattle market. He also goes to Wales every two weeks to purchase cattle. He feeds his cattle on sugar beet and milled barley. ........{......by Paul We want to be farmers when we grow up.
